org.opentcs.access.rmi.factories

Class AnonSslServerSocketFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.rmi.ssl.SslRMIServerSocketFactory
      • org.opentcs.access.rmi.factories.AnonSslServerSocketFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.server.RMIServerSocketFactory
    Deprecated. 
    Explicit support for anonymous cipher suites will be removed. Use SecureSocketFactoryProvider.

    @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
public class AnonSslServerSocketFactory
extends javax.rmi.ssl.SslRMIServerSocketFactory
    Extends the SslRMIServerSocketFactory by enabling anonymous cipher suites (see AnonSslSocketFactoryProvider.getAnonymousCipherSuites()).
